text: The Swedish Academy for Children's Books () is a nonprofit society. It was established on 26 May 1989 at the Skärholmen Library in Stockholm in Sweden. It is based on the Swedish Academy. Its ambitions is to promote children's and youth literature. Since 1990, the society awards the Eldsjälen Award. ==References== ==Other websites== * official website Category:1989 establishments in Sweden Category:Children's literature Category:Organizations based in Stockholm
title: Swedish Academy for Children's Books
